Title: Akuma no Kimuraa-hen
Description: ['A cup noodle commercials where [Kuro] Hiyoko-chan, the mascot of the "Chikin Ramen" line from Nissin, uses black magic to summon devil powers to turn into [Kuro] Hiyoko Akuma. This year marked the 60th anniversary of instant noodles\' invention.', '\n', '\n']
